data.title: The Movie DataBase
data.brief: Looking to watch a movie or tv series and don't know in which platform to stream it? This app is for you. My first React project. It's a Front-End connected to an API that, regarding your IP location will serve you where to watch it.

data.title: Crypto Prode
data.brief: The prode is kind of a fantasy football game, very popular in Argentina. Solution developed in Solidity, contract never left GitHub
